translation.en: the best- kept secret this side of, well, anywhere.
translation.es: ...el secreto mejor guardado de... cualquier parte.

translation.en: Granted, it may not look like much, but this wet heap of rock
translation.es: Cierto, no parece la gran cosa, pero este montón de rocas mojadas...

translation.en: packs more than a few surprises.
Life here is amazing, just not for the faint of heart.
translation.es: Aquí la vida es asombrosa, pero no apta para cardiacos.

translation.en: You see, where most folks enjoy hobbies
translation.es: Verán, mientras que la mayoría tiene pasatiempos

translation.en: a little something we like to call
I'm sorry, Fishlegs. Did you want that?
Did I tell you that you look amazing today, because you do.
translation.es: ¿Te dije lo hermosa que te ves hoy?

translation.en: Ugh. Come on, Barf. It's starting to stink around here.
translation.es: Vamos, Guácara, empieza a apestar aquí.

translation.en: Nope. Still hates you. Let's blow this place, Belch!
translation.es: No, aún te odia. ¡A la carga, Eructo!

translation.en: Ha- ha! That's nine for the Twins,
Fishlegs and Snotlout trail with none.
translation.es: Patapez y Patán Mocoso van detrás con cero.

translation.en: Scared him off with the big talk, didn't you, Stoick?
translation.es: Lo ahuyentaste con tu charla importante, ¿no, Estoico?

translation.en: She's my princess. Whatever she wants, she gets.
translation.es: ¡Es mi princesa! Lo que desea, lo obtiene.

translation.en: Ruffnut? Didn't she try to bury you alive?
Now, dragons used to be a bit of a problem here,
translation.es: Los dragones solían ser un problema aquí. Pero eso fue hace cinco años.

translation.en: but that was five years ago.
translation.es: Pero eso fue hace cinco años.

translation.en: Now, they have all moved in. And really, why wouldn't they?
translation.es: Ahora todos se mudaron aquí, y ¿por qué no?

translation.en: all- you- can- eat feeding stations, a full- service dragon wash,
translation.es: ...comederos ilimitados, un lavado de dragones que da servicio completo.

translation.en: even top- of- the- line fire prevention if I do say so myself.
translation.es: Si me permiten decirlo, incluso prevención de incendios de primera.

translation.en: It's time, Gobber. Righty- ho. Last lap!
The Black Sheep! Come on, Stormfly. We can still win this thing!
translation.es: ¡La oveja negra! Vamos, Tormenta, aún podemos ganar.

translation.en: Let's go! Let's go! Let's go!
Here you go, darling. Mine is worth ten.
translation.es: Aquí tienes, cariño. La mía vale diez.

translation.en: You guys are fighting for Ruffnut?
I'm totally winning! We're winning together!
Whoo! No one can stop me now!
Except for me. We're attached, genius.
- Quit trying to steal all my glory! - Hey!
- It's my glory! - Always ruining everything!
- That's my future daughter- in- law! -
Yep, Berk is pretty much perfect.
All of my hard work has paid off.
translation.es: Mi trabajo duro ha valido la pena. Y qué bueno...

translation.en: And it's a good thing, too, because with Vikings on the backs of dragons…
translation.es: Mi trabajo duro ha valido la pena. Y qué bueno... ...porque con vikingos que montan dragones...

translation.en: …the world just got a whole lot bigger.
translation.es: ...el mundo se ha hecho mucho más grande.

translation.en: So what do you think, bud?
You wanna give this another shot?
That really came out of nowhere.
We got to work on your solo gliding there, bud.
translation.es: Tenemos que practicar tu vuelo sin jinete, amigo.

translation.en: That locked- up tail makes for some pretty sloppy rescue maneuvers, hey?
translation.es: Con la cola cerrada, las maniobras de rescate fueron muy torpes, ¿no crees?

translation.en: Looks like we found another one, bud.
Oh, what, do you want an apology?
Is that why you're pouting, big baby boo?
Oh, you feeling it yet? Huh?
Picking up on all of my heartfelt remorse?
Oh, come on, come on. You wouldn't hurt a one- legged…
translation.es: Oye, oye. No le harías daño a un chico con una pierna...

translation.en: You're right! You're right! You win. You win.
translation.es: Tienes razón. Tú ganas. Tú ganas.
Dragones y vikingos, enemigos de nuevo...

translation.en: locked in combat to the bitter… Oh!
You know that doesn't wash out.
translation.es: Sabes que eso no se lava.

translation.en: So, what should we name it?

translation.es: Comezón en la axila, se llama.

translation.en: Think we might find a few Timberjacks in those woods?
translation.es: ¿Crees que encontremos algunos Trepatroncos en ese bosque?

translation.en: The odd Whispering Death or two in the rocks?
translation.es: ¿Uno o dos Susurros Mortales en las rocas?

translation.en: Who knows? Maybe we'll finally track down another Night Fury.
translation.es: ¿Quién sabe? Quizá al fin encontremos a otro Furia Nocturna.

translation.en: So, what do you say? Just keep going?
The real question is, where have you been?
translation.es: En realidad la pregunta es, ¿dónde has estado tú?

translation.en: Avoiding my dad. Oh, no. What happened now?
translation.es: -Evadiendo a mi papá. -Ay, no. ¿Qué pasó ahora?

translation.en: I wake up. The sun is shining.
Terrible Terrors are singing on the rooftop.
translation.es: Hay Terrores Terribles cantando sobre el tejado.

translation.en: I saunter down to breakfast thinking all is right with the world and I get,
translation.es: Voy plácidamente a desayunar, creyendo que todo está bien en el mundo...

translation.en: Not now, Dad. I got a whole day of goofing off to get started.
translation.es: Ahora no, papá. Tengo todo un día de ocio por delante.

translation.en: Okay, first of all, I don't sound like that.
translation.es: Antes que nada, yo no hablo así.

translation.en: And second, what is that thing you're doing with my shoulders?
translation.es: ¿Quién es esa persona? Y, ¿qué es eso que haces con los hombros?

translation.en: Yeah, that's a truly flattering impersonation.
You're the pride of Berk, son, and I couldn't be prouder.
translation.es: Eres el orgullo de Berk, hijo, y no podría estar más orgulloso.

translation.en: Aw, thanks, Dad. I'm pretty impressed with myself, too.
translation.es: Gracias, papá, yo también estoy impresionado conmigo mismo.

translation.en: When have I ever done that with my hands? You just did.
translation.es: -¿Cuándo he hecho eso con las manos? -Acabas de hacerlo.

translation.en: You're all grown up, and since no chief could ask for a better successor,
translation.es: Ya eres adulto, y como ningún jefe podría aspirar a un mejor sucesor...

translation.en: I've decided… To make you chief!
Oh, my gods! Hiccup, that's amazing!
translation.es: ¡No lo puedo creer! ¡Hipo, eso es genial!

translation.en: You're gonna wear out the spring coil. The calibration is very sensitive.
translation.es: Vas a arruinar el resorte. La calibración es muy delicada.

translation.en: this is what I'm dealing with.
I didn't. By the time he turned around, I was gone.
translation.es: -¿Qué le dijiste? -No le dije nada. Para cuando se dio vuelta, ya me había ido.

translation.en: Huh, well, it's a lot of responsibility.
The map will have to wait for sure,
translation.es: El mapa tendrá que esperar, sin duda...

translation.en: and I'll need to fly Toothless, since you'll be too busy, but…
translation.es: ...y yo tendré que volar con Chimuelo, pero...

translation.en: and running the village, that's his thing.
translation.es: ...hacer que funcione la aldea, él es bueno para eso.

translation.en: I think you're missing the point.
I mean, chief. What an honor.
You know exactly who you are.
translation.es: Tú sabes muy bien quién eres.

translation.en: I know that I'm not my father,
translation.es: Sé que no soy como mi padre...

translation.en: and I never met my mother,
translation.es: ...y no conocí a mi madre, así que...

translation.en: so what does that make me?
What you're searching for isn't out there, Hiccup.
translation.es: Lo que buscas no está allá afuera, Hipo.

translation.en: Maybe you just don't see it yet.
Is that what I think it is?
I thought they were all gone for good.
It looks like our luck's had a turn for the better, lads.
translation.es: Parece que nuestra suerte acaba de mejorar, muchachos.

translation.en: Don't think Drago has one of those in his dragon army.
translation.es: No creo que Drago tenga uno de esos en su ejército de dragones.

translation.en: Look, we don't want any trouble.
You should have thought of that before you stole all of our dragons,
translation.es: ¡Debieron pensar eso antes de robar todos nuestros dragones...

translation.en: and blasted our fort to bits!
What are you talking about? You think we did this?
translation.es: -¿De qué hablan? -¿Creen que nosotros hicimos esto?

translation.en: Dragon trapping is hard enough work
translation.es: Capturar dragones ya es un trabajo bastante duro...

translation.en: as it is without do- gooder dragon riders
translation.es: Capturar dragones ya es un trabajo bastante duro... ...sin que unos jinetes bienhechores vengan a rescatarlos.
...sin que unos jinetes bienhechores vengan a rescatarlos.

translation.en: You mean other than your thieving friend from last night? You tell me.
translation.es: ¿Además de tu amigo ladrón de anoche? Dímelo tú.

translation.en: You may have an ice- spitting dragon on your side,
translation.es: Podrás tener de tu lado a un dragón que escupe hielo...

translation.en: but we still have a quota to fill.
How do you suppose we explain this mess to Drago Bludvist?
translation.es: ¿Cómo le vamos a explicar esto a Drago Manodura?

translation.en: Drago what- fist? Does anything you say make sense?
translation.es: Drago Mano... ¿qué? Nada de lo que dices tiene sentido.

translation.en: He's expecting a new shipment of dragons for his army by tomorrow.
translation.es: Espera un nuevo cargamento de dragones para su ejército mañana.

translation.en: And Drago don't take well to excuses.
This is what he gave me last time I showed up empty- handed.
translation.es: Esto fue lo que gané la última vez que llegué con las manos vacías.

translation.en: He promised to be far less understanding in the future.
translation.es: Prometió ser bastante menos comprensivo en el futuro.

translation.en: All right, look, we don't know anything about a dragon thief
translation.es: Mira, no sabemos nada sobre un ladrón de dragones...
...ni sobre un dragón que escupe hielo...

translation.en: or your lunatic boss and his dragon army, okay?
translation.es: ...ni sobre un dragón que escupe hielo... ...ni sobre el loco de tu jefe y su ejército de dragones.

translation.en: Just give us back our dragon and we'll go,
translation.es: Solo devuélvenos a nuestro dragón y nos iremos...

translation.en: strange, hostile person whom we've never met.
translation.es: ...persona extraña y hostil a la que no conozco.
...el mejor trampero de dragones que existe.

translation.en: it's not just anyone who can capture a Night Fury.
translation.es: ...no cualquiera puede capturar a un Furia Nocturna.

translation.en: This is Toothless. He says we're going. Now.
translation.es: Y él es Chimuelo. Y dice que nos vamos. Ahora.

translation.en: You will never hold on to those dragons, you hear me?
translation.es: ¡Esos dragones no seguirán siendo suyos! ¿Me escuchan?

translation.en: Drago is coming for them all!
Hey, there, Stoick! Hey, how are you? Beautiful day.
Ah! He's probably flown off the edge of the world by now.
translation.es: De seguro ya voló más allá de los confines del mundo.

translation.en: Are you sure you want that kid running the village?
translation.es: ¿Seguro que quieres que ese chico dirija la aldea?

translation.en: You can still delay your retirement.
Who finally decided to show up for work. Yay.
translation.es: Que al fin decidió presentarse a trabajar. ¡Qué emoción!

translation.en: Hey, Dad, could I have a word? Something you're itching to tell me?
translation.es: -Papá, ¿podemos hablar? -¿Hay algo que mueras por decirme?

translation.en: Not quite the itch you're thinking of, but yes.
translation.es: No lo que te imaginas, pero sí.

translation.en: A chief's first duty is to his people, so, 41?
translation.es: El primer deber de un jefe es con su pueblo, así que... ¡41!

translation.en: - Can we just talk in private? - Forty…
That's me! That's me! I'm next!
Excuse me. I have been here all day.
translation.es: Con permiso. Llevo aquí todo el día.

translation.en: Okay, okay. I want one of those high seaters
translation.es: Bien. Quiero una silla de montar alta...

translation.en: with lots of spikes and a big stowage compartment.
translation.es: ...con muchos picos y un gran compartimento para guardar.

translation.en: This is actually a little more important than building saddles.
translation.es: Papá, esto es más importante que hacer sillas de montar.

translation.en: Lesson two. No task is too small when it comes to serving your people.
translation.es: Lección dos. No hay tarea pequeña cuando se trata de servir a tu gente.

translation.en: Excuse us, Grump. Dad, can we just talk…
Grump! You let the forge die down again!
translation.es: ¡Gruñón! ¡Otra vez dejaste que se apagara la fragua!

translation.en: That's it, Grump. You're going up for adoption.
translation.es: Se acabó, Gruñón. Te voy a dar en adopción.

translation.en: There you go. Go on. Have away.
translation.es: Listo. Adelante. Toma lo que necesites.

translation.en: Seriously, I really need to tell you about this new land we came across.
translation.es: En serio, necesito contarte sobre la tierra que encontramos.

translation.en: We didn't stick around to find out.

translation.es: Esos tipos no eran muy amistosos.

translation.en: Oh, really? Your Night Fury and Deadly Nadder
translation.es: ¿No? ¿Su Furia Nocturna y su Nader Mortífero

translation.en: didn't bring them cheering to the rooftops?
translation.es: no los hicieron salir a aplaudirles?

translation.en: Not the standard run- for- the- hills hoo- ha I've come to enjoy.
translation.es: No fue la típica huida veloz que he aprendido a disfrutar.

translation.en: Dragon trappers. You should have seen their fort.
All blown apart and stuck in giant spikes of ice. It was weird!
translation.es: Completamente destruido y clavado en picos enormes de hielo. ¡Muy raro!

translation.en: I've never seen anything like it.
And worst of all, they thought we did it!
translation.es: ¡Lo peor es que creen que nosotros lo hicimos!

translation.en: You two are gonna get yourselves in serious trouble one of these days.
translation.es: Ustedes dos se van a meter en graves problemas uno de estos días.

translation.en: Not everyone appreciates this way of life.
translation.es: No todo el mundo aprecia esta forma de vida.

translation.en: Aye, Gobber's right, son. Best we keep to our own.
translation.es: Bocón tiene razón, hijo. Es mejor ser más reservados.

translation.en: Besides, you'll have more important uses for your time.
translation.es: Además, tendrás cosas más importantes de qué ocuparte.

translation.en: Once we make the big announcement!
They are building a dragon army.
translation.es: Están reuniendo un ejército de dragones.

translation.en: Or at least the guy they work for is.
translation.es: Bueno, el tipo para el que trabajan.
Dargo Mano Sangrienta, o algo así.

translation.en: I'll bloody his fist with my face if he tries to take my dragon!
translation.es: ¡Mi mano hará que sangre su cara si intenta quitarme a mi dragón!

translation.en: Lower the storm doors! Wait! What is happening?
Come on! You heard the man! Lock it down.
No dragon or Viking sets foot off this island until I give the word!
translation.es: ¡Ningún dragón ni vikingo sale de la isla hasta que yo diga!

translation.en: Wait, because some guy you knew is stirring up trouble in some faraway land?
translation.es: ¿Porque un tipo al que conocías está armando líos en una tierra muy lejana?

translation.en: Because Drago Bludvist is a madman
translation.es: Porque Drago Manodura es un demente...

translation.en: And if he's built a dragon army, gods help us all.
translation.es: Y si está reuniendo un ejército de dragones, que los dioses nos amparen.

translation.en: Get them into their pens! Quickly!
Then, let's ride back out there.
We'll follow those trappers to Drago and talk some sense into him.
translation.es: Seguiremos a los tramperos para llegar a Drago y hacerlo entrar en razón.
No. Hay que fortificar la isla.

translation.en: It's our duty to keep the peace!
translation.es: -¡Nuestro deber es mantener la paz! -Se acabó la paz, Hipo.

translation.en: Peace is over, Hiccup. I must prepare you for war.
translation.es: -¡Nuestro deber es mantener la paz! -Se acabó la paz, Hipo. -Debo prepararte para la guerra. -¿Guerra?

translation.en: Dad, if Drago is coming for our dragons,
translation.es: Papá, si Drago viene por nuestros dragones...

translation.en: we can't wait around for him to get here.
translation.es: ...no podemos esperar a que llegue hasta aquí.

translation.en: Let's go find him and change his mind.
translation.es: Vamos a buscarlo para hacerlo cambiar de opinión.

translation.en: No, some minds won't be changed, Hiccup.
translation.es: No, hay quien no cambia de opinión, Hipo.

translation.en: Berk is what you need to worry about.
translation.es: Lo que debe preocuparte es Berk.
Un jefe protege a los suyos.

translation.en: Secure the stables! Latch every stall!
With this wind, we'll reach Drago by daybreak,
translation.es: ¡Con este viento, estaremos con Drago al amanecer...

translation.en: so best we fill this ship up with dragons, and quick!
translation.es: ...así que más nos vale llenar este barco con dragones, y rápido!

translation.en: It's no time to be picky.
translation.es: No es momento de ponerse exigentes.

translation.en: Uh… Eret? Not if we want to keep our…
Net them, lads! Take them down!
You're not getting away this time.
translation.es: Esta vez no van a escapar.

translation.en: And here I was, worried we might turn up empty- handed.
translation.es: Y a mí que me preocupaba llegar con las manos vacías.

translation.en: Nope. It's your lucky day. - - We give up.
translation.es: No. Es tu día de suerte. Nos rendimos.

translation.en: That's one Night Fury, one Deadly Nadder,
translation.es: Son un Furia Nocturna, un Nader Mortífero...

translation.en: and two of the finest dragon riders west of Luk Tuk.
translation.es: ...y dos de los mejores jinetes de dragones al oeste de Luk Tuk.

translation.en: That ought to make the boss happy, right?
translation.es: Eso hará feliz a tu jefe, ¿no?

translation.en: - What are you doing? - Toothless, stay.
Uh, the dragons don't care for cramped spaces, so they'll just hang out with you.
translation.es: A los dragones no les gustan los espacios cerrados, se quedarán afuera con ustedes.

translation.en: You know, wooden boat, big ocean. How is your swimming?
translation.es: Barco de madera, el océano inmenso... ¿Son buenos nadadores?

translation.en: Oops! Almost forgot. You can't have armed prisoners.
translation.es: Casi lo olvido. Sus prisioneros no pueden tener armas.

translation.en: Just what every dragon trapper needs.
translation.es: Es lo que todos los tramperos de dragones necesitan.

translation.en: One end coats the blade in Monstrous Nightmare saliva.
translation.es: Un extremo cubre la espada de saliva de Pesadilla Monstruosa.

translation.en: The other sprays Hideous Zippleback gas.
translation.es: La otra rocía gas de Cremallerus Espantosus.

translation.en: All it takes is a spark, and…

translation.es: Sí, justo así. Si te ve como uno de los suyos, se puede

translation.en: Once they see you as one of their own,
translation.es: Si te ve como uno de los suyos, se puede entrenar incluso al dragón más malhumorado.

translation.en: even the testiest dragons can be trained. Right, bud?
translation.es: entrenar incluso al dragón más malhumorado. -¿Cierto, amigo? -¡Dame eso!

translation.en: No game. We just wanna meet Drago.  Why?
translation.es: -A nada. Solo queremos ver a Drago. -¿Por qué?

translation.en: Because I'm going to change his mind about dragons.
translation.es: Haré que cambie de opinión respecto a los dragones.

translation.en: He can be really persuasive. Once you've earned his loyalty,
translation.es: -Puede ser muy persuasivo. -Cuando te has ganado su lealtad...

translation.en: there is nothing a dragon won't do for you.
translation.es: ...no hay nada que un dragón no haga por ti.

translation.en: You won't be changing any minds around here.
translation.es: No vas a hacer a nadie cambiar de opinión.

translation.en: I can change yours. Right here. Right now.
translation.es: Puedo hacer que tú cambies de opinión. Aquí y ahora.

translation.en: See how well I protect and provide?
translation.es: ¿Ves que soy buen protector y proveedor?

translation.en: - - What is with all the nets?  Hey, watch it! That was…
What are you guys doing here?
I don't need to be rescued!  Enough!
Well, didn't you just pick the wrong ship?
I am Eret, son of  Eret.
You, saddle up. We're going home.
translation.es: Tú, sube a tu dragón. Nos vamos a casa.

translation.en: I'm trying to protect our dragons and stop a war!
translation.es: ¡Intento proteger a nuestros dragones y evitar la guerra!

translation.en: Because war is what he wants, son!
translation.es: ¡Sí, porque él quiere que haya guerra, hijo!

translation.en: Years ago, there was a great gathering of chieftains
translation.es: Hace años, hubo una gran reunión de jefes...

translation.en: to discuss the dragon scourge we all faced.
translation.es: ...para hablar sobre la plaga de dragones que enfrentábamos.

translation.en: Into our midst came a stranger from a strange land,
translation.es: De pronto, llegó un extraño de tierras extrañas...

translation.en: covered in scars and draped in a cloak of dragon skin.
translation.es: ...lleno de cicatrices, con un manto hecho de piel de dragón.

translation.en: and spoke softly, saying that he,
translation.es: ...y habló tranquilamente, y dijo que él...

translation.en: Drago Bludvist, was a man of the people,
translation.es: ...Drago Manodura, era un hombre de la gente...

translation.en: devoted to freeing mankind from the tyranny of dragons.
translation.es: ...dedicado a librar a la humanidad de la tiranía de los dragones.

translation.en: He claimed that he alone could control the dragons
translation.es: Aseguró que solo él podía controlar a los dragones...

translation.en: and that he alone could keep us safe,
translation.es: ...y que solo él podía mantenernos a salvo...

translation.en: if we chose to bow down
Until he wrapped himself in his cloak and cried out,
translation.es: Hasta que se cubrió con su manto y gritó:

translation.en: Then see how well you do without me!
translation.es: ¡Entonces verán cómo les va sin mí!

translation.en: The rooftop suddenly burst into flames,
translation.es: De pronto, el techo estalló en llamas...

translation.en: and from it, armored dragons descended,
burning the hall to the ground.
was the only one to escape.
Men who kill without reason cannot be reasoned with.
translation.es: No se puede razonar con quienes asesinan sin razón.
Aun así lo voy a intentar.

translation.en: This is what I'm good at.
And if I could change your mind,
translation.es: Si pude hacerte cambiar de opinión...

translation.en: Lead the others back to Berk.
translation.es: Lleva a los demás de regreso a Berk.

translation.en: I've had enough mutiny for one day.
translation.es: Ya tuve suficientes motines por un día.

translation.en: I'm not gonna let anything happen to you.
translation.es: No voy a permitir que te pase nada.

translation.en: Hey! You left my dragon back there!
He can't fly on his own! He will drown!
translation.es: ¡No puede volar solo! ¡Se va a ahogar!

translation.en: Uh, we have to head back for my dragon!
Do you even understand what I'm saying?
Toothless! It's okay, it's okay, it's okay.
I'm glad to see you, too, bud.
translation.es: También me da gusto verte, amigo.

translation.en: - You really had me worried there. -
No, you were only a babe.
Boar- headed! Just like his mother!
Aye, she could never stay put either.
And a Viking. Could there be a worse combination?
translation.es: Y es vikingo. ¿Hay una combinación peor?

translation.en: When I think of how stubborn and senseless you were back in the day…
translation.es: Cuando pienso en lo testarudo e insensato que eras...

translation.en: Well, not much has changed, actually.
translation.es: Bueno, en realidad no has cambiado mucho.

translation.en: Ah, you know what he's like. He won't give up, Gobber.
translation.es: Ya sabes cómo es. No se va a dar por vencido, Bocón.

translation.en: And if Hiccup finds Drago, before we find him…
translation.es: Y si Hipo encuentra a Drago antes que nosotros a él...
Nada puede hacerle daño a Hipo mientras esté con el Furia Nocturna.

translation.en: so long as that Night Fury's around. It's a Night Fury!
translation.es: Nada puede hacerle daño a Hipo mientras esté con el Furia Nocturna. ¡Es un Furia Nocturna!

translation.en: Hold on. Wait just a minute.
You can't just say something like that and run off!
translation.es: ¡No puedes decir algo así y salir corriendo!

translation.en: You're my mother? I mean, what the…
Do you grasp how insane it sounds?
Where have you been all this time?
But they said you were dead!
Everyone thinks you were eaten by…
translation.es: Todos creen que te comieron los...

translation.en: This is where you've been for 20 years?
It's a bit much to get my head around, to be frank.
It's not every day you find out
translation.es: No todos los días uno se entera de que su madre es...

translation.en: your mother is some kind of crazy, feral,
translation.es: No todos los días uno se entera de que su madre es... ...una guardiana de dragones, un poco loca y salvaje.
...una guardiana de dragones, un poco loca y salvaje.

translation.en: At least I'm not boring, right?
I suppose there is that one specific thing.
He might very well be the last of his kind.
translation.es: Es posible que sea el último de su especie.

translation.en: Wow. No wonder you get along so well.
How did you manage to… I found him in the woods.
He was shot down and wounded.
This Snafflefang lost his leg to one of Drago Bludvist's iron traps.
translation.es: Este Colmillo Afilado perdió la pata en una de las trampas de Drago Manodura.

translation.en: This Raincutter had her wing sliced by razor netting.
translation.es: A esta Cortalluvia le despedazó el ala una de sus redes.
Y a este pobre Gruñido Tambaleante...

translation.en: was blinded by a tree snare and then left to die alone and scared.
translation.es: ...lo cegó una trampa y lo abandonaron, solo y asustado, para que muriera.

translation.en: Did Drago or his trappers do this, too?
translation.es: ¿Drago y sus tramperos le hicieron eso?

translation.en: I'm actually the one who shot him down.
You couldn't save all of me, could you? You just had to make it even.
translation.es: No pudiste salvarme completo, ¿verdad? Teníamos que estar a mano.

translation.en: What did your father think of your Night Fury friend?
translation.es: ¿Qué opinó tu padre de tu amigo el Furia Nocturna?

translation.en: He didn't take it all that well.
Pretty soon, everyone back home had dragons of their own.
translation.es: Pronto todos en Berk tenían sus propios dragones.

translation.en: - If only it were possible. - No, really.
Believe me, I tried, as well,
but people are not capable of change, Hiccup.
Some of us were just born different.
Berk was a land of kill- or- be- killed,
translation.es: En Berk debías ser cazador o cazado...

translation.en: but I believed peace was possible.
translation.es: ...pero yo creía que la paz era posible.

translation.en: Stop! You'll only make it worse!
It was a very unpopular opinion.
Then, one night, a dragon broke into our house,
translation.es: Entonces, una noche, un dragón se metió a nuestra casa...

translation.en: was proof of everything I believed.
translation.es: ...fue la prueba de todo en lo que yo creía.

translation.en: You and your father nearly died that night,
translation.es: Tú y tu padre por poco mueren esa noche...

translation.en: all because I couldn't kill a dragon.
translation.es: ...porque fui incapaz de matar a un dragón.

translation.en: It broke my heart to stay away,
but I believed you would be safer if I did.
translation.es: ...pero creí que sería más seguro hacerlo.

translation.en: Oh, Cloudjumper never meant to harm me.
He must have thought I belonged here.
translation.es: Probablemente pensaba que este era mi lugar.

translation.en: In the home of the great Bewilderbeast.
translation.es: En el hogar de la gran Salvajibestia.

translation.en: One of the very few that still exist.
translation.es: Uno de los pocos que aún existen.

translation.en: but this is the king of all dragons.
translation.es: ...pero este es el rey de todos los dragones.

translation.en: With his icy breath, this graceful giant built our nest.
translation.es: Con su aliento helado, este gigante delicado construyó nuestro nido.

translation.en: A safe haven for dragons everywhere.
translation.es: Un refugio para los dragones de todas partes.

translation.en: He's responsible for all that destruction?
translation.es: ¿Él es el responsable de tanta destrucción?

translation.en: We all live under his care and his command.
translation.es: Todos vivimos bajo sus cuidados y sus órdenes.

translation.en: All but the babies, of course,

translation.es: ...que no le hacen caso a nadie.

translation.en: I've lived among them for 20 years, Hiccup,
translation.es: He vivido con ellos durante 20 años, Hipo...

translation.en: Uh. Yeah, I could eat. Good. It's feeding time.
translation.es: -Sí, podría comer. -Bien. Es hora de comer.

translation.en: They should have been back with Hiccup by now.
translation.es: Ya deberían estar de vuelta con Hipo.

translation.en: I don't like it either. Eret, son of Eret
translation.es: A mí tampoco me gusta. Eret, hijo de Eret...

translation.en: was the man of my dreams. My everything!
translation.es: ...era el hombre de mis sueños. ¡Mi príncipe azul!

translation.en: But, baby, I grew facial hair for you.
translation.es: Pero, nena, me dejé crecer la barba por ti.

translation.en: What if Drago shot them down?
What if they need our help?
Wait, what? No, but Stoick said…
It doesn't matter what he said, if they have all been captured.
translation.es: No importa qué haya dicho, si es que los capturaron.

translation.en: We have nowhere to go, nothing to sell,
translation.es: ¡No tenemos a dónde ir, nada que vender...

translation.en: and no heads to call our own!
If we don't turn up with dragons, and fast…
translation.es: Si no llegamos allá con dragones, y pronto...
-¡Ten cuidado con lo que deseas! -¡Hagan algo!

translation.en: Yay! Can he ride with me? Can he?  Can he?
You're gonna show us the way to Drago.
translation.es: Nos vas a llevar con Drago.

translation.en: And help dragon riders sneak into Drago's camp? Just kill me now.
translation.es: ¿Ayudar a unos jinetes a entrar al campamento de Drago? -Mátenme de una vez. -Podríamos hacer eso.

translation.en: That could be arranged. Stormfly, drop it!
translation.es: -Mátenme de una vez. -Podríamos hacer eso. ¡Tormenta, suéltalo!

translation.en: Okay! I'll take you to Drago!
Hey, I thought we were going to eat.
Then, from Dragon Island, I found this archipelago…
translation.es: Luego, de la isla Dragón descubrí este archipiélago.

translation.en: I don't even feel the cold. I just feel…
translation.es: ...ni siquiera siento el frío. Solo me siento...

translation.en: This is what it is to be a dragon, Hiccup.
translation.es: ¡Así se siente ser un dragón, Hipo!

translation.en: It's all well and good to call yourself a dragon,
translation.es: Puedes decir que eres un dragón, pero...

translation.en: We just about had it that time!
All this time, you took after me.
translation.es: Todo este tiempo te pareciste a mí.

translation.en: Will you give me another chance?
I can teach you all that I have learned these past 20 years.
translation.es: Puedo enseñarte todo lo que he aprendido en estos 20 años.

translation.en: Now you can make those tight turns.
translation.es: Ya puedes dar esas vueltas cerradas.

translation.en: And I'll show them all to you.
translation.es: Y yo te los mostraré todos.

translation.en: find every last species together, as mother and son.
translation.es: ...encontraremos a todas las especies juntos, como madre e hijo.

translation.en: This gift we share, Hiccup, it bonds us.
translation.es: Compartimos este don, Hipo, eso nos une.

translation.en: This is who you are, son.
translation.es: Esto es lo que eres, hijo.

translation.en: We will change the world for all dragons.
translation.es: Cambiaremos al mundo por el bien de todos los dragones.

translation.en: We will make it a better, safer place.
translation.es: Lo convertiremos en un lugar mejor, más seguro.

translation.en: Now you and I can go talk to Drago together.
translation.es: Ahora podemos ir juntos a hablar con Drago.
No se puede hablar con Drago.

translation.en: Come on, we should be getting back.
Okay! Look, I got you here. Now get this thing off me.
translation.es: ¡Bien! Ya los traje aquí. Quítenme esta cosa de encima.

translation.en: Never take a toy from a dragon. Don't you know anything?
translation.es: Jamás le quites un juguete a un dragón. ¿No sabes nada?

translation.en: Why does this keep happening to me?

translation.es: Burbujas de gran diámetro, pulmones enormes...

translation.en: I'm thinking class- five leviathan, maybe six.
translation.es: Yo creo que es un monstruo marino clase 5, quizá 6.

translation.en: Always great to see you, my friend!
Well, as you can see, I'm right on time with a new batch of dragons,
translation.es: Como ves, llego justo a tiempo con un nuevo lote de dragones...

translation.en: just like I promised.  He's waking up!
I also caught you their riders.
Turns out, there is a whole bunch of them out there.
translation.es: Resulta que hay muchos de ellos allá afuera.

translation.en: Drago doesn't have them after all.
translation.es: Así que Drago no los tiene.

translation.en: My men are hunting them down as we speak.
translation.es: Mis hombres están cazándolos en este momento.

translation.en: They won't know where you're hiding, I promise you that.
translation.es: No sabrán dónde te ocultas, lo prometo.

translation.en: Yes, they will. They know we're missing,
translation.es: Sí lo sabrán. Saben que desaparecimos...

translation.en: If you so much as touch us, Hiccup is gonna kick--
translation.es: Si siquiera nos tocas, Hipo te va a dar una...

translation.en: He's only the son of Stoick the Vast, his heir to the throne of Berk,
translation.es: Solo es el hijo de Estoico el Vasto, heredero del trono de Berk...

translation.en: and the greatest dragon master this world has ever seen!
translation.es: ...¡y el más grande experto en dragones que el mundo jamás haya visto!

translation.en: And unless you let us go, right now,
translation.es: Y si no nos dejas ir de inmediato...

translation.en: he will blast through here on his Night Fury
translation.es: ...vendrá hasta aquí sobre su Furia Nocturna...

translation.en: and blow your entire fleet of ships to splinters.
translation.es: ...y convertirá toda tu flota de barcos en astillas.

translation.en: Then they will be crying like babies.
Funny and beautiful. Good one, babe!
First, there was one rider, and now, all of Berk.
translation.es: Primero era un jinete, y ahora es toda Berk.

translation.en: And you led them to me!
We must attack the dragon riders' nest at once!
translation.es: ¡Debemos atacar el nido de los jinetes de dragones de inmediato!

translation.en: We will take down their alpha!
Well, bud, we can't wait around for Drago to attack this place.
translation.es: Amigo, no podemos quedarnos aquí esperando a que Drago ataque este lugar.

translation.en: Are you kidding me? How did you get in here?
The same way we are getting you out.
Wait. There's something you need to know.
translation.es: Espera, hay algo que debes saber.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, tell me on the way.
translation.es: Sí, sí, me cuentas en el camino.

translation.en: This isn't an on- the- way kind of update, actually.
translation.es: No es algo para contar en el camino.

translation.en: More of the earth- shattering- development variety.
translation.es: Es más bien el tipo de noticia que sacude a la tierra.

translation.en: Yeah, just add it to the pile.
Dad, unlike most surprises I spring on you, this is one you'll like.
translation.es: Papá, a diferencia de las sorpresas que suelo darte, esta te va a gustar.

translation.en: You just have to handle it delicately. So…
translation.es: Solo debes tomarlo con calma. Así que...

translation.en: You might want to take this one.
translation.es: Quizá tú quieras hacerte cargo de esto.

translation.en: could you put the sword away, please?
I know what you're gonna say, Stoick.
translation.es: Ya sé qué vas a decir, Estoico.

translation.en: How could I have done this?
Stayed away all of these years? And why did I not come back to you?
translation.es: ¿Alejarme todos estos años? ¿Y por qué no volví contigo?

translation.en: Well… What sign did I have that you could change, Stoick?
translation.es: ¿Qué me indicaba que podrías cambiar, Estoico?

translation.en: I pleaded so many times to stop the fighting,
translation.es: Les pedí muchas veces que dejaran de pelear...

translation.en: to find another answer, but did any of you listen?
translation.es: ...que buscaran otra solución, pero no me escucharon.

translation.en: This is why I never married.
translation.es: Por eso yo nunca me casé.
Por esto y por otra razón.

translation.en: I know that I left you to raise Hiccup alone,
translation.es: Sé que te dejé solo para criar a Hipo...

translation.en: but I thought he would be better off without me.
translation.es: ...pero pensé que estarían mejor sin mí.

translation.en: And I was wrong, I see that now, but…
translation.es: Y estaba equivocada, ahora lo sé, pero...

translation.en: You're as beautiful as the day I lost you.
translation.es: Estás tan hermosa como el día que te perdí.

translation.en: Could this day get any worse?  Let me see.
We're gonna jump into freezing cold water, then die from drowning.
translation.es: Vamos a saltar al agua helada y morir ahogados.

translation.en: You are a steaming heap of dragon…
translation.es: Eres un montón de excremento de...

translation.en: Warn the others! Get them, you son of an Eret.
translation.es: -¡Adviértanle a los demás! -¡Acábalos, hijo de Eret!

translation.en: So, are we going to save your dragons and get out of here, or not?
translation.es: ¿Vamos a salvar a tus dragones y a salir de aquí, o no?

translation.en: Check every trap. They're here somewhere.
translation.es: Revisen todas las trampillas. Están por aquí.

translation.en: Anyone coming? I don't know. You just keep doing what you are doing.
translation.es: -¿Alguien viene? -No sé. Solo sigue haciendo eso.

translation.en: Thank you for saving my life.
Now let me return the favor.
translation.es: Te voy a devolver el favor.

translation.en: Mom, you'd never even recognize it.
Where we used to make weapons, we now build saddles, wing- slings.
translation.es: Antes hacíamos armas y ahora sillas de montar, alas ortopédicas.

translation.en: You wouldn't believe how much everything's changed.
translation.es: No creerías cuánto ha cambiado todo.

translation.en: Your son has changed Berk for the better.
translation.es: Nuestro hijo ha cambiado Berk para bien.

translation.en: I think we did well with this one, Val. - Thanks, Dad. - Oh!
translation.es: -Hicimos un buen trabajo con él. -Gracias, papá.

translation.en: I'm a little out of practice.
translation.es: Hace mucho que no hago esto.

translation.en: - I didn't marry you for your cooking. - I hope not.
translation.es: -No me casé contigo por cómo cocinas. -Eso espero.

translation.en: Her meatballs could kill more beasts than a battle- axe.
translation.es: Sus albóndigas matan a más bestias que una batalla con hachas.

translation.en: I've still got a few knocking around in here.
translation.es: Aún tengo un par aquí adentro.

translation.en: And once you move back in, with all your dragons…
translation.es: Y cuando te mudes para allá, con todos tus dragones...

translation.en: Drago won't even stand a chance.
Slow down, son. It's a lot to take in.
translation.es: Más despacio, hijo. Hay mucho que asimilar.

translation.en: I'll swim and sail on savage seas
With ne'er a fear of drowning
And gladly ride the waves of life
Will stop me on my journey
If you will promise me your heart
My dearest one My darling dear
translation.es: Mi buen amor Tan dulce y leal

translation.en: But I've no need of mighty deeds
When I feel your arms around me
But I would bring you rings of gold
I'd even sing you poetry Whoo! Oh, would you?
And I would keep you from all harm
If you would stay beside me
I have no use for rings of gold
I care not for your poetry
I only want your hand to hold
I only want you near me
translation.es: Mejor que eso, no hay más

translation.en: To love and kiss, to sweetly hold
translation.es: Mejor que eso, no hay más Con tus abrazos y tu amor

translation.en: For the dancing and the dreaming
translation.es: En las danzas y los sueños

translation.en: Through all life's sorrows and delights
I'll keep your love inside me
I will swim and sail on savage seas
With ne'er a fear of drowning
And gladly ride the waves of life
I thought I would have to die before we could have that dance again.
translation.es: Creí que tendría que morir antes de que bailáramos de nuevo.
No es necesario recurrir a medidas drásticas.

translation.en: Will you be my wife once again?
We can be a family! What do you say?
Thank Odin you didn't listen to me, son.
translation.es: Gracias a Odín no me hiciste caso, hijo.

translation.en: We never would have found each other.
Val! It's all right, it's all right.
We're a team now. What do you want to do?
translation.es: Ahora somos un equipo. ¿Qué quieres hacer?

translation.en: We have to save the dragons.
Aye. You got it! Come on, son.
Whatever comes, keep hitting the mountain.
translation.es: Pase lo que pase, no dejen de atacar la montaña.

translation.en: We need to draw the alpha out.
You really are full of surprises!

translation.es: ¡Abran paso a los jinetes de dragones!

translation.en: Oh, you know, catching up with Mom.
translation.es: Ya sabes, poniéndome al día con mamá.

translation.en: Now you know where I get my dramatic flair.
translation.es: Ahora ya sabes de dónde heredé lo dramático.

translation.en: The alpha! Now we have a fight!
Show them what you got, bud.
I've waited a long time for this!
They are controlled by the alpha!
Then it's a good thing I brought a challenger.
translation.es: Pues qué bueno que traje un rival.

translation.en: That is a class ten! Class ten!
Come on! Take down the alpha!
Val, do you think you can stop them? I'll do my best.
It takes more than a little fire to kill me!
translation.es: ¡No basta un pequeño incendio para acabar conmigo!

translation.en: Come on, Gobber! Right behind you, Stoick!
This is the great dragon master?
translation.es: ¿Este es el gran experto en dragones?

translation.en: The son of Stoick the Vast?
All of this loss, and for what?

translation.es: Los dragones son criaturas amables y asombrosas...

translation.en: I know what it is to live in fear.
translation.es: Sé lo que es vivir con miedo.
Ver mi aldea convertida en cenizas...
Pero desde que era un niño...

translation.en: I vowed to rise above the fear of dragons
translation.es: ...juré superar el miedo a los dragones...

translation.en: and liberate the people of this world.
translation.es: ...y liberar a la gente de este mundo.
¿Y por qué un ejército de dragones?

translation.en: Well, you need dragons to conquer other dragons.
translation.es: Se necesitan dragones para vencer a otros dragones.

translation.en: Or maybe you need dragons to conquer people.
translation.es: O quizá necesitas a los dragones para conquistar a la gente.

translation.en: To control those who follow you,
and to get rid of those who won't.
translation.es: ...y para deshacerte de quienes no quieren serlo.

translation.en: And we have the answer back on Berk.
translation.es: Y tenemos la solución en Berk.

translation.en: Just let me show you. No!
No dragon can resist the alpha's command.
translation.es: Ningún dragón puede resistirse a las órdenes de un alfa.

translation.en: So, he who controls the alpha
translation.es: Así que, quien controla al alfa...

translation.en: Toothless, you okay, bud? What's going on?

translation.es: Sé testigo de la fuerza verdadera.

translation.en: The strength of will over others.
translation.es: La fuerza de regir sobre la voluntad de otros.

translation.en: What did he just tell you?
No, no, no, no. Come on. What are you doing? Knock it off.
translation.es: No, no, no, no. ¿Qué haces? Basta.

translation.en: Go on! Get out of here!
It's not his fault. You know that.
translation.es: No es su culpa. Lo sabes.

translation.en: Good dragons under the control of bad people…
translation.es: Los dragones buenos controlados por personas malas...

translation.en: Gather the men and meet me at Berk!
translation.es: ¡Reúnan a los hombres y alcáncenme en Berk!

translation.en: and lead you through Odin's great battlefield.
translation.es: ...y te guíen por el gran campo de batalla de Odín.

translation.en: May they sing your name with love and fury
translation.es: Que canten tu nombre con amor y furia...

translation.en: so that we might hear it rise from the depths of Valhalla
translation.es: ...para que lo escuchemos surgir desde el corazón de Valhalla...

translation.en: and know that you have taken your rightful place
translation.es: ...y sepamos que has llegado al lugar que te corresponde...

translation.en: For a great man has fallen.
translation.es: Pues ha muerto un gran hombre.

translation.en: I'm not the chief that you wanted me to be.
translation.es: No soy el jefe que tú querías que fuera.

translation.en: And I'm not the peacekeeper I thought I was.
translation.es: Y no soy el pacificador que creía ser.

translation.en: You came early into this world.
translation.es: Llegaste antes de tiempo a este mundo.

translation.en: You were such a wee thing.
I feared you wouldn't make it.
He always said you would become the strongest of them all.
translation.es: Siempre dijo que serías el más fuerte de todos.

translation.en: You have the heart of a chief and the soul of a dragon.
translation.es: Tienes corazón de jefe y alma de dragón.

translation.en: Only you can bring our worlds together.
translation.es: Solo tú puedes unir nuestros mundos.

translation.en: That is who you are, son.
translation.es: Eso es lo que eres, hijo.

translation.en: I was so afraid of becoming my dad.
translation.es: Tenía mucho miedo de convertirme en mi papá.

translation.en: Mostly because I thought I never could.
translation.es: Sobre todo porque pensé que no podría hacerlo.

translation.en: How do you become someone that great?
translation.es: ¿Cómo te conviertes en alguien tan grande...

translation.en: I guess you can only try.
translation.es: Supongo que no queda más que intentarlo.
Un jefe protege a los suyos.

translation.en: But won't that Bewilderbeast just take control of these guys, too?
translation.es: ¿Ese Salvajibestia no controlará también a estos dragones?

translation.en: They're babies. They don't listen to anyone.
translation.es: Son bebés. No obedecen a nadie.

translation.en: Some might suggest this is poorly conceived.
translation.es: Algunos dirían que es un plan poco meditado.

translation.en: It's a good thing that I never listen.
translation.es: Qué bueno que no presto atención.

translation.en: Get Toothless back and kick Drago's…
translation.es: Recuperar a Chimuelo y darle a Drago una...

translation.en: No one can protect you now.
Distract the alpha. Try to keep his focus off Toothless.
translation.es: Distraigan al alfa. Que no se concentre en Chimuelo.

translation.en: Uh… How? Have you forgotten who you're riding with?
There isn't a dragon alive that I can't wrangle!
translation.es: ¡No hay un solo dragón vivo que no pueda domar!

translation.en: Keep them coming! Black sheep, baby!
You certainly are hard to get rid of, I'll say that.
translation.es: Es difícil deshacerse de ti, lo admito.

translation.en: It's me. I'm right here, bud.

translation.es: Pero, por favor, gran experto en dragones...

translation.en: He will not miss a second time.
Please. You are my best friend, bud.
translation.es: Por favor. Eres mi mejor amigo.

translation.en: We need to get those two apart.
We gotta block him out, Toothless.
Now let's try this one more time!
This is what it is to earn a dragon's loyalty.
translation.es: Esto es ganarse la lealtad de un dragón.
El alfa los protege a todos.

translation.en: You never cease to amaze me, bud.
Toothless, you know that doesn't wash out!
translation.es: ¡Chimuelo, ya sabes que eso no se lava!

translation.en: Oh, give me a cuddle, Grumpy!
Don't you ever leave again, Hookfang.
You are! Yes, you are! I missed you!
That was some pretty fine dragon wrangling back there.
translation.es: Esa forma de manejar a los dragones fue muy impresionante.

translation.en: You know, Skullcrusher's gonna need somebody to look after him now.
translation.es: ¿Sabes? Rompecráneos va a necesitar a alguien que lo cuide.

translation.en: Your father would be every bit as proud as I am.
translation.es: Tu padre estaría tan orgulloso como yo.

translation.en: I'm really glad you're here, Mom.
translation.es: Me alegra que estés aquí, mamá.
Y aquí me voy a quedar.

translation.en: I told you it was in here.
translation.es: Te dije que lo traías dentro.

translation.en: Still doing that one? That's hilarious.

translation.es: ¡Que viva el jefe! ¡Que viva el jefe!

translation.en: Long live the chief! Long live the chief!
translation.es: ¡Que viva el jefe! ¡Que viva el jefe! ¡Que viva el jefe!

translation.en: A bit trampled and busted and covered in ice, but it's home.
translation.es: Un poco aplastada, maltratada y cubierta de hielo, pero es un hogar.

translation.en: Those who attacked us are relentless and crazy.
translation.es: Quienes nos atacaron son implacables y dementes.

translation.en: We may be small in numbers,
bigger than anything the world can pit against us.
translation.es: ...pero defendemos algo más grande que cualquier problema que podamos enfrentar.

translation.en: We are the voice of peace.
translation.es: Somos la voz de la paz.

translation.en: And, bit by bit, we will change this world.
translation.es: Y, poco a poco, cambiaremos este mundo.

translation.en: You see, we have something they don't.
translation.es: Verán, tenemos algo que ellos no.

translation.en: Oh, sure, they have armies, and they have armadas,
translation.es: Claro que tienen ejércitos... ...y tienen flotas de guerra...

translation.en: Let the wind carry us To the clouds, hurry up, all right
